message.body: Ready for clinic!?! starts in a few weeks, right?

I'm going to go with YES I Am!!! (Why not rock it/be confident?) I think soliciting patients is he scariest part. Do you have suggestions on how you did that? My issue (besides not feeling as confident about my skill set/me at this point) is that most peo
You're a really nice cheerleader btw.
koala AND the thumbs up AND the heart?! Wow. I'm flabbergasted
You're sweet!

Not much advice on the solicitation for the same reasons u say. Don't trust Eds expertise as a marketing person. I think the clinic should have a sandwich board outside w balloons - Ed didn't think it would work but it worked really well when we had ou
Not sure if that would count as a solicited patient though

Ooh I like it! I'm doing clinic Saturday morning and it will be 5 of my classmates plus 3 seniors. Good idea. I made a blog/website too. Can I send it to you for feedback? I just want to get ok now with getting patients bc I plan to do private practice wh

great re Saturdays. In some cases u won't even have to sell yourself. Just being in room. Smiling. Getting water when assisting is all it takes. At end of semester u can ask if u can give them your card (write name on it w clinic shifts for fall). Sure
Don't forget that most authorities' just know a few hairs more than the ppl in the audience. U already have that. Plus u have passion. It can be contagious
Won should have classes where we work on elevator speech. Answer questions etc
U will learn to wing that in clinic and fine tune your lingo
Yes there should be a class where we practice elevator speech. Totally!!! I've done that a few times and need to work on language for different people.

I'm not worried about people knowing more than me as much as I just don't know how I would make a presentation that appalled to multiple people and didn't fail? Maybe I will do something about the changing if the seasons or something related to Acu that w
You did a presentation on stress and Acu? Where did you do that?

U can't outguess everyone's reasons for coming. In most cases acu they are just curious. Do what interests u and whatever u do do it well. Whatever u do there may be questions like does it hurt. How big are needles etc. be ready for those. Did stress

I don't think I answered ur question well but I tried. Don't feel u have to do everything in April and may. Perhaps getting feel for clinic is best start then expand ur marketing efforts in fall. U also can't control that someone who likes your presenta
You know I will do it well when I do it! I actually really like your reminder to not do it all in April and May. Getting settled first might be more important/make more sense. :)
Ed is not the person to learn marketing from!
I totally know that u will do it well! Let the others spaz while u settle in study. Observe, practice the talk etc.
Ed may teach u things in clinic but outside? Hmmmm
I shouldn't say that. U an learn from Anyone w experience even if its just to get insight as to how others think and expose yourself to that
"May" :)

lol. Ed goes in phase where he is in teacher mode and when he is in passive "tell me how that makes u feel" bs mode. He is supportive as a supervisor and he will respect u cuz I know u will study and have rationale for your treatments

Don't apologize. I'm smiling and I completely understand. Also I don't think that you are a jerk. I can't stand Eds needle class. I don't get it at all. There's no technique covered ever. No ergonomics or anything.
it's just a good place to practice. Hate to say this but u have to teach yourself a lot at the won. Don't rely on them.
I think u will like Donna
Yes I probably will like Donna.
Watching Ed needle ears hurts MY back
I know the teach yourself us good and bad.
U are still a fawn. Do I have one of those in my bag?
You should see me needle. It's a mess so far but will get better.
Yes Ed is moody/has phases.
It's really weird to watch at times. You never know which Ed you will get.
Nope no deer or fawn
Lol. True
Yeah I know! I guess no deer in Japsn hence no emojis!!!
I like being a baby deer.
exactly! Tough for them to migrate to islands
Don't take this the wrong way but if u ever became a stripper u could use Bambi as your stage name
Excuse me. Adult entertainer
I already have a drag queen stage name: Madonnica. When I'm really naive some people call me Moronica.
And last time I was with my teacher in NYC she saw what a little snobby princess I can be. I was prancing around in a dress she said reminded her of a baton twirler or ice dancer.
So then recently I gave myself a princess name fit for a prissy but daydreamy and sometimes smug metal cf.
Are you ready??? Only three people have heard it so far. It's perfect: Princess Shit Cloud.
Lmao. Love those names!!!
Add to the mix: Bambi
Bambi is so lame and non creative compared to those. Scratch it off list
Tho I already had a stripes name. It's your first pet plus the street you lived on as a child. That makes me: Peaches Twilight!!!!!
U are well in control of your alter egos
Lol
If you can think of a name for me when I'm in pity party mode, that's a me I haven't named yet!!!
I won't give her a name. I just want to put her in basket and put her in the river
lol. Yes. No room for her here :)
To float away forever?
You're gonna need a BIG basket!!!
Can I get Chinese class and Ethics with Ed (is there a book??) and Counseling with Helen books from you sometime??
Also can I feed you tiny cakes or something yummy someday after a Sunday PCA shift?
I already have those books set aside from u. No need to pay me
Ok. Let me know when you bring them in. We have till May so no rush!! I am over buying books I don't really need. I have enough books from my English major days!
Want me to leave at PCA? I think u have class Thursday nights right?
I am home at 7 on most Thursdays but not this one. Going to a restaurant called Yang Ming!!!!!!
cool. Big date?
3-7. Usually out by 7:30ish
Aaaah. Cool
What time do you work Thursdays?
Date with my classmates.
Maybe the next Thursday I could pick up the books and say hi to you!!
cool. Whatever works for u. Pls Make sure u remind me the day before
I will gladly do that. It will be nice to see your sweet face!
And nice to see your spleen deficient student self
Pooping solid my friend!
I feel so good finally! Bob W recommended a different probiotic brand--Sedona--and it's amazing!!!
Can I please send you this most amazing video? A friend sent it from a wedding. The wedding singer did everything from Eric Clapton to Vanilla Ice. His Beyonce costume is the tiny thong. Love it. ￼
What the...
I watched it five times. It is so random and weirdly joyous. Humans giving other humans permission to gyrate.
I know u watched it at least six times and are trying to book him for your WON graduation party
Oh shit that would be the best! Evidently Janet does karaoke really well. I left the Xmas party too soon...
no. I can't imagine that
I want him at the won graduation!!! Can you imagine?
How much do you think it would cost to get him here from Rhode Island??
With or without the thong?
I'm thinking August is high demand wedding time. It will be tough to get him here
Yes lmto
Lmao for real!
Or Lmto!
Boo!!!
But w 15 months to practice I'm sure u can find someone in ur class to do similar show.
There is something fabulously wrong with me. I have watched that video 8 times! And I swear god it gets more surprising and funny each time!!!
I hope so!!! Six people so far have put a cat photo into a presentation for me!!!
Do you love texting this much? You really are prolific once I get you going!
